# environment

**Type**

The server environment, either sandbox or production.

## Declaration

```swift
string environment
```

## Discussion

You receive notifications in the sandbox environment when you opt in to receive notifications in the sandbox environment and test your app in the sandbox environment. TestFlight also uses the sandbox environment to send notifications. To opt in to receive notifications, see [https://help.apple.com/app-store-connect/#/dev0067a330b]. For more information about testing, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/StoreKit/testing-at-all-stages-of-development-with-xcode-and-the-sandbox], and [https://developer.apple.com/testflight/].

## App metadata and environment

- **appAppleId**: The unique identifier of an app in the App Store.
- **bundleId**: The bundle identifier of an app.
- **bundleVersion**: The version of the build that identifies an iteration of the bundle.
- **status**: The status of an auto-renewable subscription at the time the App Store signs the notification.
